DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Oral HMS5552 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind placebo-controlled safety study single oral dos HMS5552 give healthy volunteer . The primary objective characterize safety profile HMS5552 follow single ascend dos ( SAD ) healthy adult subject . The secondary objective include : 1 . To assess pharmacokinetic profile HMS5552 single dose 2 . To assess preliminary pharmacodynamic profile HMS5552 Each study subject receive single oral dose HMS5552 . During dose , eight subject allocate receive HMS5552 two subject allocate receive placebo treatment . Several dos HMS5552 test . Dose titration reduction determine cohort base safety pharmacokinetic data obtain low dose cohort .
